title: Disarray
description:
Philip Markle, Ethan Suplee, and Kambri Crews share stories about a Berlin sex party, heroin withdrawal, and a daughter coping with her father's crimes.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Philip Markle, Ethan Suplee, Kambri Crews, Kevin Allison, MopMop, Taj Easton, John Lennon, Damon Albarn, Johnny Bristol, Philip Sparkle)
